thread.title: Trot to the beach for Thanksgiving; shed the turkey during half-marathon

title: Trot to the beach for Thanksgiving; shed the turkey during half-marathon
text:
A- A A + Sports Commission Press Releases 
Cheering crowds. Star athletes. Proud parents. The Gulf Shores & Orange Beach Sports Commission brings them all together at area sporting venues. From tennis and basketball to softball, baseball and track - we've got game! 
The Gulf Shores & Orange Beach Sports Commission is a partnership between Gulf Shores & Orange Beach Tourism , Coastal Alabama Business Chamber and the Cities of Gulf Shores and Orange Beach . We work together to bring quality sporting events to the area. 
The press releases below will keep you up-to-date on the latest sporting news. You can also browse our tourism-related releases here . For sports media assistance and additional information, contact Ally Dorrough at 251-968-9327 or ADorrough@GulfShores.com .
